name: Parallel Olympus
description:
---

How you put your hands on the Six Marbles of Myth is too long a story to tell. But right after employing their unfathomable power to alter the dimension of Olympus, you embark on a journey through that now puzzled lands to realize your wildest whim in life. Fight the beasts whom guard the lands and the sky, solve the puzzles that bar you from the heart of lovely Goddesses, and finally, claim the highest authority - Master of Olympus.

KEY FEATURES



---

- Immerse yourself in the rhythmic and lush environment of an unusual Olympus
- Fight mythical beasts that are both scary and cute
- Sway your way through dangerous obstacles and deadly traps
- Collect the hearts of all Goddesses and unlock hidden stories
